StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetOpera.onalData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@edipi varchar(10) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @result varchar(max) DECLARE @tempJson varchar(max)
--RssOss.[dbo].[RCTAPI_GetOpera.onalData] 1266694055 --DECLARE @edipi varchar(10) --SET @edipi = 1266694055
DECLARE @nowMinusTwoYear date.me, @nowMinusOneYear date.me
SET @nowMinusTwoYear = DATEADD(year, -2, GETDATE()) SET @nowMinusOneYear = DATEADD(year, -1, GETDATE())
-- Recruiter Info SELECT TOP 1 u.FirstName ,u.LastName ,rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID AS Recrui.ngPersonId ,rp.rowguid AS Recrui.ngPersonGuid ,ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ,ro.rowguid as OrgGuid ,ro.COUNTY_CODE ,ro.STATE_CODE ,ro.CITY_CODE ,ro.Street ,ro.Street2 ,ro.ZIP_CODE INTO #Recruiter FROM UserMgmt.dbo.[User] u INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p ON u.FirstName = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.LastName=p.LAST_NAME INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = ro.OrgUnitId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Dis.nguishedName like '%' + @edipi AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY LastAc.vityDate DESC
-- Nwa related to the recruiter SELECT rowguid INTO #nwaList FROM ( SELECT n.rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON (n.WORKING_RECRUITER_ID = r.Recrui.ngPersonId)
UNION
SELECT n.rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON (n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = r.Recrui.ngPersonId)
) T1
-- Prospect related to the recruiter SELECT * INTO #prospectList FROM (SELECT pr.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN #Recruiter recrut ON pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = recrut.Recrui.ngPersonGuid UNION SELECT pr.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN #nwaList n ON pr.NwaId = n.rowguid ) T
-- current nwa disposi.on for the prospect SELECT cs2.NWA_ID, cs2.DISPOSITION_CODE INTO #CurrentCandidateStatus FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs2 INNER JOIN ( SELECT cs.NWA_ID, MAX(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) AS CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN #prospectList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON pr.NwaId = n.rowguid INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID WHERE pr.NwaId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY cs.NWA_ID ) T ON --cs2.NWA_ID = T.NWA_ID AND cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = T.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID
--.nal Prospect list with .lters SELECT pr.ProspectId INTO #prospectFinalList FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN #prospectList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON pr.NwaId = n.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN #CurrentCandidateStatus ccs ON ccs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID WHERE pr.Ac.ve = 1 AND ( ( (pr.Expira.onDate >= @nowMinusOneYear OR pr.PACCreateDate >= @nowMinusOneYear) AND pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = 2 ) OR ( (pr.Gradua.onYear >= DATEPART(year, @nowMinusTwoYear) OR pr.CreatedDate >= @nowMinusOneYear) AND pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = 1 ) OR pr.ProspectDisposi.onId IN (3) OR pr.NwaId IS NOT NULL ) AND pr.ProspectDisposi.onId <> 5
-- Eject CANDIDATE_STATUS DISPOSITION_CODE -- Contract DEP Discharge (L), NWA DQ-Medical (G), NWA DQ-Mental (H), NWA DQ-Moral (I), NWA DQ-Other (J) -- Eject ProspectDisposi.on PDQ (4)
AND pr.ProspectDisposi.onId <> 4 AND ( ccs.DISPOSITION_CODE IS NULL OR ccs.DISPOSITION_CODE NOT IN ('L', 'G', 'H', 'I', 'J') )
-- physicalProblems SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectPhysicalProblemsId AS physicalProblemsId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,Implants AS implants ,Contacts AS contacts ,Opera.ons AS opera.ons ,Medicines AS medicines ,BrokenBones AS brokenBones ,Asthma AS asthma ,Tatoos AS tatoos ,Vision AS vision ,Other AS other FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectPhysicalProblems pp INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pp.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--WHERE ProspectPhysicalProblemsId='97aca4a4-1979-499e-91b1-12dd142a96f1' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('physicalProblems'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = ISNULL(@tempJson, '"physicalProblems":[]')
-- drugUses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectDrugUseId AS drugUseId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,DrugTypeId AS drugTypeId ,OtherDrug AS otherDrugType ,DrugLastUsed AS dateLastUsed ,DrugFirstUse AS dateFirstUsed ,NumberOfTimeUsed AS .mesUsed ,Detail AS details FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDrugUse du INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = du.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--WHERE ProspectDrugUseId = '07813503-caf6-4e6d-9e5e-5b44a60f2499' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('drugUses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"drugUses":[]')
-- moralO.enses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectLegalO.enseId AS moralO.enseId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,ISNULL( o.ense1Geo.rowguid, o.ense2Geo.rowguid ) AS cityId ,LegalO.enseId AS o.enseId ,IsGuilty AS adverseAdjudica.onId ,IsJuvenile AS o.enseSummaryId ,LegalO.enseDate AS o.enseDate ,ZipCode AS zip ,Disposi.on AS disposi.on ,Detail AS details ,WaiverCode AS waiverCode FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectLegalO.ense lf INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = lf.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION o.ense1Geo --City ON o.ense1Geo.CITY_CODE = lf.LegalO.enseCity AND o.ense1Geo.STATE_CODE = lf.LegalO.enseCountry AND o.ense1Geo.COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION <> 'UNITED STATES' AND (o.ense1Geo.STATE_CODE <> '00' AND o.ense1Geo.COUNTY_CODE <> '000' AND (o.ense1Geo.CITY_CODE NOT IN ('0000', '0')))
LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION o.ense2Geo --City ON o.ense2Geo.CITY_CODE = lf.LegalO.enseCity AND o.ense2Geo.COUNTY_CODE = lf.LegalO.enseCounty AND o.ense2Geo.STATE_CODE = lf.LegalO.enseState AND o.ense2Geo.COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION = 'UNITED STATES' AND (o.ense2Geo.STATE_CODE <> '00' AND o.ense2Geo.COUNTY_CODE <> '000' AND (o.ense2Geo.CITY_CODE NOT IN ('0000', '0')))
--WHERE ProspectLegalO.enseId= 'bb8e686f-2515-4683-8f0e-027faaa9e26a' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('moralO.enses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"moralO.enses":[]')
-- dependents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectDependentId AS dependentId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,DependentType AS dependentTypeCode ,RecordStatus AS veri.ca.onStatusCode ,DependentAddressID AS dependentAddressId ,FirstName AS .rstName ,MiddleName AS middleName ,LastName AS lastName ,Su.xCode AS su.x ,DateOfBirth AS dateOfBirth ,OtherDescrip.on AS otherRela.onship FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDependent pd INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pd.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--WHERE ProspectDependentId = '320aeb9a-82c3-4414-af85-2b60c788e69d'--- '4819f10e-081f-4531-a680-381a01f2b414' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('dependents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"dependents":[]')
-- comments SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectCommentId AS commentId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,ProspectAc.vityCommentId AS ac.vityCommentId ,Comment AS commentText ,ProspectDate AS commentDateTime ,ResultDate AS resultDateTime ,IsApproved AS isApproved FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where ProspectCommentId = '490c6f89-5b28-41f2-b1d7-006dda5b7705' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('comments'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"comments":[]')
-- educa.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectEduca.onId AS educa.onId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,EduCreden.alCode AS educa.onCreden.alCode ,Educa.onCode AS educa.onCer..ca.onCode ,Educa.onLevel AS educa.onLevelCode ,SchoolCode AS schoolId ,EduStatusCode AS educa.onStatusCode ,EduProjectedTierCode AS educa.onProjectedTierCode ,CompletedDate AS dateCompleted ,LastYearAtended AS lastYearAtended ,YearGraduated AS gradua.onYear ,Educa.onCompleted AS educa.onCompleted FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pe.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--WHERE ProspectEduca.onId = '204a29f9-409f-4323-bbad-c65853eda37d' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.ons":[]')
-- exams SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS examId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,ExamType AS examTypeId ,pe.CareerDecision AS careerDecisionId ,ExamDate AS examDate ,Score AS examScore ,ExamEnteredDate AS examEnteredDate ,PiCatMmScore AS piCatMmScore ,PiCatGtScore AS piCatGtScore ,PiCatElScore AS piCatElScore ,PiCatClScore AS piCatClScore FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam pe INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pe.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId --where ID = 'fe999e47-be7a-43.-b84a-589d9a081035' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('exams'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"exams":[]')
-- priorServices SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS priorServiceId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,ReenlistmentCode AS reenlistmentCode ,ServiceID AS serviceId ,Separa.onCode AS separa.onCode ,ServiceCharacter AS serviceCharacterCode ,RecordStatus AS veri.ca.onStatusCode ,Ac.veDutyStartDate AS ac.veDutyStartDate ,Ac.veDutyEndDate AS ac.veDutyEndDate ,EndObligatedServiceDate AS endOfObligatedServiceDate ,IsCurrentlyInReserves AS currentlyInReserves FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectPriorService ps INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where ID = 'c6ead550-c3af-4fdf-9fd8-3a2e676835d4' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('priorServices'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"priorServices":[]')
-- dependentAddresses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DISTINCT da.DependentAddressID AS dependentAddressId ,ISNULL( da1Geo.rowguid, da2Geo.rowguid ) AS cityId ,Street1 AS street1 ,Street2 AS street2 ,ZipCode AS zipCode FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.DependentAddress da INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDependent pd ON da.DependentAddressID = pd.DependentAddressID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = pd.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION da1Geo --City ON da1Geo.CITY_CODE = da.CityCode AND da1Geo.STATE_CODE = da.StateCode AND da1Geo.COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION <> 'UNITED STATES' AND (da1Geo.STATE_CODE <> '00' AND da1Geo.COUNTY_CODE <> '000' AND (da1Geo.CITY_CODE NOT IN ('0000', '0')))
LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION da2Geo --City ON da2Geo.CITY_CODE = da.CityCode AND da2Geo.COUNTY_CODE = da.CountyCode AND da2Geo.STATE_CODE = da.StateCode AND da2Geo.COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION = 'UNITED STATES' AND (da2Geo.STATE_CODE <> '00' AND da2Geo.COUNTY_CODE <> '000' AND (da2Geo.CITY_CODE NOT IN ('0000', '0')))
--where da.DependentAddressID = '598c9761-ca72-4797-b3e9-09bdae4a303c' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('dependentAddresses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"dependentAddresses":[]')
-- prospectStatusHistories SET @tempJson = ( SELECT HistoryID AS prospectStatusHistoryId ,sh.ProspectID AS prospectId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,Disposi.onID AS candidateDisposi.onCode ,UpdateDate AS updateDate ,rowguid AS rowGuid FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory sh INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = sh.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where historyId = 1774585 FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('prospectStatusHistories'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"prospectStatusHistories":[]')
-- heightWeightIsts SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS heightWeightIstId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,TestDate AS recordDate ,Height AS height ,[Weight] AS [weight] ,RunTimeMinute AS runTimeMin ,RunTimeSecond AS runTimeSec ,Pullup AS pullUps ,Hang AS .exArmHang ,Crunch AS crunches ,AmmoCanLi. AS ammoCanLi. ,Pushup AS pushUps ,ppi.Note AS notes FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst ppi INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = ppi.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where id = '178fac07-07cf-48c2-9d93-.57319888b1' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('heightWeightIsts'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"heightWeightIsts":[]')
-- medicalExams SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectMedicalExamID AS medicalExamId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,MedicalExamType AS medicalExamTypeCode ,MepsOrganiza.onID AS mepsOrganiza.onCode ,MedicalExamDate AS medicalExamDate ,P_GeneralBodyBuild AS generalBodyBuild ,U_UpperBody AS upperBody ,L_LowerBody AS lowerBody ,H_Hearing AS hearing ,E_Eyes AS eyes ,S_MentalPsychological AS mentalPsychological ,VisualColor AS visionColorCode ,VisualColorDisposi.on AS visualColorPassCode ,Le.CorrVisualAcuity AS le.CorrVisualAcuity ,RightCorrVisualAcuity AS rightCorrVisualAcuity ,Le.UncorrVisualAcuity AS le.UncorrVisualAcuity ,RightUncorrVisualAcuity AS rightUncorrVisualAcuity ,Height AS height ,[Weight] AS [weight] ,MedicalDisposi.on AS medicalDisposi.onCode ,Consulta.onType AS consulta.onTypeCode FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectMedicalExam m INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = m.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where ProspectMedicalExamID = 'dfec7d56-8f39-4d3f-a8a4-47b10185c048' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('medicalExams'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"medicalExams":[]')
-- asvabs SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS asvabId ,pr.PersonId AS personId ,ExamDate AS examDate ,GS_Score AS gsScore ,AR_Score AS arScore ,WK_Score AS wkScore ,PC_Score AS pcScore ,NO_Score AS noScore ,CS_Score AS csScore ,AS_Score AS asScore ,MK_Score AS mkScore ,MC_Score AS mcScore ,EI_Score AS eiScore ,VE_Score AS veScore ,GT_Score AS gtScore ,EL_Score AS elScore ,CL_Score AS clScore ,MM_Score AS mmScore ,AFQT AS afqt ,MepsOrgID AS mepsOrgId ,[Version] AS [version] FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAsvab av INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.ProspectId = av.ProspectId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where id = '7d537c6c-e5dd-4a35-a4cf-6b86797c114f' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('asvabs'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"asvabs":[]')
-- sectorRecruiters SET @tempJson = ( SELECT SectorRecruiterId AS sectorRecruiterId ,SectorID AS sectorId ,msr.Recrui.ngPersonId AS recrui.ngPersonId FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr INNER JOIN #Recruiter recrut ON msr.Recrui.ngPersonId = recrut.Recrui.ngPersonGuid
--where SectorRecruiterId='03e078d2-db48-4263-bdf3-266a30c906ca' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('sectorRecruiters'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"sectorRecruiters":[]')
-- listImports SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DISTINCT ie.ImportEventId AS listImportId ,ImportTypeId AS importTypeId ,ImportEventStatusTypeId AS importEventStatusTypeId ,ImportFileName AS importFileName ,ie.PersonId AS personId ,SchoolId AS schoolGuid ,ie.Gradua.onYear AS gradua.onYear ,DateObtained AS dateObtained ,DateStarted AS dateStarted ,DateCompleted AS dateCompleted ,Notes AS notes ,ie.SubSta.onType AS subSta.onType ,ie.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onId ,ie.[Source] AS [source] ,ListCode AS listCode ,DateAc.ve AS dateAc.ve ,RecordCount AS recordCount ,DateCompleted AS dateToContactSheet ,ie.LastUpdateDate AS lastUpdateDate FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportEvent ie INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportPerson ipp ON ie.ImportEventId = ipp.ImportEventId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON ipp.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where ie.importEven.d = '28e2447c-6a.-4653-ad6f-f7dbe32d025b' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('listImports'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"listImports":[]')
-- personImports SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ipp.ImportPersonId AS importPersonId ,ipp.ImportEventId AS listImportId ,ipp.PersonId AS personId ,ipp.ImportPersonStatusTypeId AS importPersonStatusTypeId ,ipp.ImportFileRecordNumber AS importFileRecordNumber
FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportPerson ipp INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON ipp.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN #prospectFinalList pl ON pr.ProspectId = pl.ProspectId
--where ipp.ImportPersonId = 'baeb4f9c-6565-418d-8c1e-a8.94b532ee' FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('personImports'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"personImports":[]')
SET @result = '{' + @result + '}' SELECT @result
DROP TABLE #Recruiter DROP TABLE #nwaList DROP TABLE #prospectList DROP TABLE #prospectFinalList DROP TABLE #CurrentCandidateStatus
